Prepare stratification data

Source: R/fst_WC84.R
prep_strata.Rd

Read and join strata information to the main dataset, standardising population levels.

Usage

prep_strata(
  data,
  strata,
  pop.levels = NULL,
  blacklist.id = NULL,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

A tibble containing genetic data.

strata

Path to the strata file or a tibble containing strata information.

pop.levels

(optional) A character vector specifying the population levels to use for factor levels of `STRATA`. Default: NULL.

blacklist.id

(optional) A vector of individual IDs to blacklist. Default: NULL.

verbose

(logical) Show progress messages. Default: FALSE.

Value

A tibble with updated `STRATA` column and joined strata info.
